---
title: "Briefings"
---

Weekly briefings happen **every Monday morning at 10am**, on Zoom. These are live webinar style, and not recorded. You won't need to turn your camera on (but you can ask questions via chat and polls).

> All stage 1 students are expected to attend the weekly briefing. 

The Zoom link [can be found on the main DLE pages here](https://dle.plymouth.ac.uk/mod/url/view.php?id=1840804&forceview=1)
